sections.name: Somnalu Oculus
sections.html: When Somnalu is defeated, its central eye abandons its dying body to create an ethereal body from the wisps of dreams. Over centuries—or sooner, if it can find a powerful source of nightmares—it can re-form a full body and return to its corporeal self.

sections.name: Somnalu
sections.html: Nethys note: no description was provided for this family.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Aberration
traits.text: Aberrations are creatures from beyond the planes or corruptions of the natural order.

traits.name: Dream
traits.text: Creatures native to the Dimension of Dreams can be any alignment and possess a diverse array of abilities, although those associated with the nightmare realm of Leng are almost always evil and immune to that realm’s freezing temperatures.

automatic_abilities.name: Scrutinizing Presence

traits.name: Aura
traits.text: An aura is an emanation that continually ebbs out from you, affecting creatures within a certain radius. Aura can also refer to the magical signature of an item or a creature with a strong alignment.

traits.name: Mental
traits.text: A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.

automatic_abilities.text: The Somnalu Oculus scrutinizes creatures around it, causing them to falter with nervousness and self-doubt. Upon entering the emanation, a creature must attempt a Will save. On a failed save, the creature is stupefied 2 for 1 round. Regardless of the result of the saving throw, the creature is temporarily immune to scrutinizing presence for 1 minute.

automatic_abilities.name: Clearing Blink
automatic_abilities.trigger: The Somnalu Oculus would be affected by a condition
automatic_abilities.effect: The Somnalu Oculus rapidly blinks, using dream wisps as an eyelid. The Somnalu Oculus attempts to counteract the source of the condition with a counteract modifier of +24 and a counteract level of 8. It can't use Clearing Blink again for 1d4 rounds.

traits.name: Finesse
traits.text: You can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls using this melee weapon. You still use your Strength modifier when calculating damage.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: Natural attacks with this trait can be used to attack creatures up to the listed distance away instead of only adjacent creatures. Weapons with this trait are long and can be used to attack creatures up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. For creatures that already have reach with the limb or limbs that wield the weapon, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

traits.name: Range
traits.text: These attacks will either list a finite range or a range increment, which follows the normal rules for range increments.
